column4: He never intended on creating that expectation, I don't think.
For sure. His first press releases were too unfocused.
The whole anti-RH anti-suse stuff?
Seriously?
You're in Aus, right?
yes
Mind if I ask your opinion of a recent CS Honours grad from middle-of-fucking-nowhere Canada getting sponsored for an Aus work visa? :)
hrm, dunno
the work is picking up a bit here, depending on what you want to do
.NET/C# development, most likely. Java, if I had to.
Mono, if I manage to land some kind of dream job ;)
haven't heard of too many mono gigs around here yet
Yeah, I imagine they are still pretty sparse.
nice place to be, but we're going down some of the same stupid roads canada has
Oh? What roads might those be? (There are many)
Ah. Yeah, I can probably deal with that. :)
yeah, we're going to have to work on that
I'm not entirely familiar with the internals of the Canonical business plan. Do you guys have anything in mind for supporting Universities?
If there were marketing/promotional materials of any kind, I think the community could do some pretty good marketing for ubuntu with it. I know I would.
Can't wait to see what you come up with. :) My U is looking for a new Linux solution for our CS dept right now, and ubuntu would be perfect.
